column4: Where can I go to find more info on ubuntu versions(such as gnome, kde, etc).
what info are you looking for exactly?  They are all the same, just with different Desktop Environments
I'm looking to find info on which desktop enviroments are supported on 12.04
that would be an #ubuntu+1 question (but i don't think there is any change from current, it's whatever is available in the repo)
